data.title: Tesla Cybertruck Gigafactory will be in central US, possibly Nashville, Musk says
data.text: The new factory will support Model Y production, too, and a report floated Nashville may be on their shortlist.

data.title: Tesla stock drops despite monster market rally
data.text: Tech stocks rose, but Tesla shares sank on Friday after weeks of market turmoil sparked by covid-19 and oil price wars.

data.title: Tesla shareholder trial delayed by judge due to coronavirus concerns
data.text: The judge for the Tesla shareholder trial said on Friday that the case will be delayed until "concerns regarding COVID-19 have abated."

data.title: Tesla chief Elon Musk's trial postponed due to coronavirus
data.text: Elon Musk's expected defense of a $2.2 billion deal in court was postponed on Friday from its expected Monday start, due to the coronavirus outbreak.

data.title: Why Tesla Stock Fell Sharply Friday
data.text: Shares have now fallen 45% from an all-time high earlier this year.

data.title: Musk trial over Tesla-Solarcity deal postponed due to coronavirus outbreak
data.text: Monday's trial over shareholder accusations that Telsa Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk pushed the electric vehicle maker to buy an allegedly worthless SolarCity for $2.2 billion to benefit himself has postponed without a new date being set, a spokesman at Delaware's Court of Chancery said on Friday.

data.title: 3 Stocks That Have Doubled  and Still Have Room to Grow
data.text: Backup power, alternative energy, and electric vehicles have proved a winning combination in the market.

data.title: Outspoken Tesla chief Elon Musk faces $1 billion trial, test of temperament
data.text: Elon Musk is expected to defend a $2.2 billion deal in court next week criticized by shareholders as benefiting Musk at the expense of Tesla Inc , and the outcome may depend as much on the chief executive's temperament as on the facts of the case.
